original_text: Then Pharaoh took his king's ring from his finger and he put it on Joseph's finger. He dressed Joseph in beautiful clothes made of linen. He put a gold chain round Joseph's neck.
korean_text: 자기의 인장 반지를 빼어 요셉의 손에 끼우고 그에게 세마포 옷을 입히고 금 사슬을 목에 걸고

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh took his king's ring from his finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바로가 그의 손가락에서 왕의 반지를 빼고

sentences.original_text: and he put it on Joseph's finger
He dressed Joseph in beautiful clothes made of linen
He put a gold chain round Joseph's neck
